Data: 1.50 pm: It's a good Saturday to all you following this game between India and Australia at the Feroz Shah Kotla in New Delhi. It's a really busy day for all of us here but don't worry, we're not going to pile it on you guys. The toss is about 10 minutes away.
Praveen to Watson, no run just a bit of late inswing and well defended on the front foot by Watson, one slip in place
Praveen to Watson, no run just goes back and across and punches it down to cover
Praveen to Watson, no run that one really jags back in off a good length and traps him on the hip but above the line of the stumps
Praveen to Watson, no run curves it back in and he tucks it softly towards short midwicket
Praveen to Watson, no run stays behind the line and softly taps it to mid-on, the ball's not coming on all the quick onto the bat

Praveen to Watson, FOUR runs nice square drive to get off the mark, Praveen swings it away and but lands it too full and wide, enough time for Watson to get on his knees and place it wide of backward point
Nehra to Ponting, 1 run angles it on the pads and he nudges it down to fine leg
Nehra to Watson, no run bowls it back of a length outside off and he moves across and taps it to cover
Nehra to Watson, 2 runs bowls it fuller and slower, shapes to drive straight but he gets an inside edge to the on side
Nehra to Watson, 1 run drifts on the pads this time and it's an easy nudge to fine leg who's quite square

Nehra to Ponting, FOUR runs commits to the front foot fairly early and it works for Ponting as he shows the full face of the bat and merely pushes it past the gap at cover, exquisite timing carries it to the boundary
Nehra to Ponting, no run slower ball angling away from the right-hander, he leaves it alone and the ball bounces again before reaching the keeper
Praveen to Watson, no run on target, swings it in and Watson defends with soft hands
Praveen to Watson, no run firm punch off the front foot and intercepted by the bowler
Praveen to Watson, no run cramps him for room and gets late swing, once again he defends with soft hands
Praveen to Watson, no run gives him just a hint of width and this time he gets beside the line and softly taps it to point
Praveen to Watson, no run stays back and punches it to mid-off, inswing this time
Praveen to Watson, no run and he ends with a maiden, another punch straight to mid-off
Nehra to Ponting, no run keeps a wee bit low and Ponting gets forward early and defends back to the bowler
Nehra to Ponting, no run stays beside the line and knocks it down to point
Nehra to Ponting, no run once again the ball stops on Ponting a bit as he gets beside it and chops it to point

Nehra to Ponting, FOUR runs nice timing, he angles it across the right hander, Ponting gets beside the line, opens the face of the bat and uses his bottom hand to good effect to angle it just wide of third man
Nehra to Ponting, 1 run slower ball on the pads and tucked just wide of mid-on, nice stop by the fielder
Nehra to Watson, no run drops it on a good length just outside off, he gets across his stumps and taps it to mid-off
Praveen to Ponting, no run he drops it short of a length and once again it stops on the batsman, he gets across early and then has to check his shot
Praveen to Ponting, no run gets behind the line and defends it away
Praveen to Ponting, no run swings it in, tucks him up for room, he gets across and taps it down to mid-on
Praveen to Ponting, 1 run a slip would have gobbled that up, he opens the face of the bat to a slower ball and deliberately angles it wide of the keeper, third man mops up
Praveen to Watson, no run gets forward and taps it to the off side
Praveen to Watson, 1 run angles it towards the pads and knocks it down to deep square leg
Nehra to Watson, 1 run it's a direct hit but the batsman's home, he taps it to mid-on, they push for the single and Raina hits the stumps at the bowler's end but watson's safe
Nehra to Ponting, no run Appeal! Ponting defends very close to his pads and it appeared as if it was pad first and then bat, close call but fair enough decision by Sanjay Hazare
Nehra to Ponting, no run stays beside the line and taps it to the off side
Nehra to Ponting, no run
Nehra to Ponting, no run
Nehra to Ponting, no run gets well forward and defends softly down the track
Praveen to Watson, no run
Praveen to Watson, no run he shapes to bang that through the off side and he ends up chopping it down to short point
Praveen to Watson, no run stays back and pushes it to the off side

Praveen to Watson, FOUR runs terrific shot! Drops it just short of a length and slightly wide of the off stump, the bounce was just right for Watson to show the full face of the bat and punch it effortlessly wide of mid-off
Praveen to Watson, no run angles it towards the pads and he clips it down to mid-on
Praveen to Watson, no run stays beside the line and taps it towards cover
Nehra to Ponting, no run the off cutter this time, he tries to tuck it to the on side but the ball clips his pads
Nehra to Ponting, FOUR runs drops it a bit too short and Ponting swivels, gets on top of the bounce and pulls it wide of midwicket
Nehra to Ponting, 1 run drifts on the pads and Ponting helps it on its way down to fine leg
Nehra to Watson, no run stays back and pushes it down to mid-off
Nehra to Watson, no run keeps it just outside the off stump and he's content pushing it down to mid-off
Nehra to Watson, no run another backfoot punch down the track and mid-off runs across to pick it up
Sharma to Ponting, no run lands it on target just outside the off stump and he knocks it down to midwicket

Sharma to Ponting, FOUR runs all you need to do is find the gap and that's exactly what Ponting did so effortlessly, a defensive push off the front foot through the line was enough to beat mid-on, lovely shot
Sharma to Ponting, 1 run gets forward and pushes it straight to the covers
Sharma to Watson, no run he nearly concedes a boundary there, friendly half volley on the pads and he clips it away but finds Tendulkar at short midwicket, sharp save
Sharma to Watson, no run gives him width and he tries to cut past backward point but he finds the fielder
Sharma to Watson, 1 run drifts on the pads and he clips him to fine leg
Nehra to Watson, 1 run good improvisation there by Watson as he gets forward, waits for the ball to come onto him before angling him down to third man
Nehra to Ponting, 1 run stays back and pushes it down the track just wide of the bowler, pinches a single
Nehra to Watson, no run shuffles and clips it

Nehra to Watson, 2 runs excellent fielding there, Nehra comes round the wicket and Watson fetches it from the off stump, clips him uppishly and the ball races towards the midwicket boundary but Praveen gives the chase, times his dive well and pulls it back
Nehra to Watson, no run Watson tucks it to mid wicket, straight to the fielder this time
Nehra to Watson, 1 run stays behind the line and clips him down to mid-on
Jadeja to Watson, 2 runs flighted on middle and leg and he works it down to wide long-on
Jadeja to Watson, 2 runs this one really grips off the surface and has the batsman in a tangle, he checks his shot and the outside edge beats first slip
Jadeja to Watson, FOUR runs crisp timing there, he flights it on middle and leg, Watson gets his bat and weight behind the ball and merely pushes it past mid-on, the ball races away
Jadeja to Watson, 1 run
Jadeja to Ponting, no run stays back and knocks it to the off side
Jadeja to Ponting, 1 run gets beside the line and angles it just wide of point
Sharma to Ponting, 1 run gets forward a little early and Ponting taps it just wide of point and sets off
Sharma to Watson, no run keeps it straight and around the off stump, the batsman's happy to defend it back to the bowler
Sharma to Watson, 1 run clips it just in front of mid-on and really puts pressure on the fielder by calling quickly for the single, the throw is wide
Sharma to Ponting, 1 run sharp single again, he opens the face and angles it with soft hands just wide of point and the throw to the batsman's end it just wide
Sharma to Watson, 1 run stays beside the line and taps it to the off side, they take a single
Sharma to Ponting, no run gets behind the line and defends
Jadeja to Watson, no run flighted outside off and defended with soft hands to the off side
Jadeja to Watson, no run grips and straightens, he defends it away
Jadeja to Watson, no run almost an edge! The ball grips and turns this time, the batsman tries to push it to the off side but the turn beats him
Jadeja to Watson, no run defends it easily to the off side this time
Jadeja to Watson, FOUR runs shot! He drops it fractionally short this time, fetches it from the off stumps and clubs it wide of midwicket
Jadeja to Watson, 2 runs clips him down to deep square leg and pushes for the second run
Sharma to Ponting, 2 runs drifts on the pads and it's not recommended when the fine leg's up, he clips it away and Harbhajan pulls it back
Sharma to Ponting, no run gets behind the line and tries to drive but he mistimes the shot
Sharma to Ponting, 1 run opens the face of the bat and runs it down to third man
Sharma to Watson, no run gets behind the line and defends very firmly
Sharma to Watson, no run full on the pads and asking to be hit, he ends up clipping it straight to midwicket

Sharma to Watson, FOUR runs that's a super shot, he drops it on a good length and Watson picks the length early, gets on top of the bounce and slaps it in the air in the gap between mid-on and midwicket
Jadeja to Ponting, 1 run gets forward and drives to mid-off
Jadeja to Watson, 1 run stays beside the line and cuts him down to point
Jadeja to Ponting, no run
Jadeja to Ponting, no run goes on the backfoot to defend
Jadeja to Ponting, no run appeal! Gets forward to defend and it's pad first, maybe struck him just outside the line of the off stump
Jadeja to Ponting, no run gets well forward and defends to the off side
Harbhajan to Watson, no run slow through the air, defends with soft hands
Harbhajan to Watson, no run Quicker through the air and defended easily
Harbhajan to Watson, no run gets forward and clips him down to midwicket
Harbhajan to Watson, no run flighted on middle and off and defended back to the bowler
Harbhajan to Watson, 1 run stays back, shuffles and works him behind square on the on side
Harbhajan to Ponting, 1 run drops it in front of midwicket and hurries the single, the throw was just wide of the stumps
Yuvraj to Ponting, 1 run stays back and taps him down to mid-off

Yuvraj to Watson, OUT sharp work by Dhoni! Yuvraj tosses it up outside off and draws Watson forward, he's beaten on the drive, the ball holds its line and Dhoni whips off the bails before the batsman can draw his backfoot back at the crease, the third umpi
Yuvraj to Hussey, 1 run gets forward and drives to mid-off
Yuvraj to Ponting, no run flighted outside off and clipped to midwicket
Yuvraj to Ponting, 1 run stays back and pushes it against the turn to mid-on
Yuvraj to Hussey, no run gets forward and clips him straight to short midwicket
Harbhajan to Ponting, no run gets forward and smothers the spin
Harbhajan to Ponting, 1 run gives it extra flight and Ponting takes a pace forward and drives with the spin to long-on
Harbhajan to Hussey, 1 run flighted on middle and leg and clipped to midwicket
Harbhajan to Ponting, 1 run flighted on middle and leg, he tucks him down to fine leg
Harbhajan to Hussey, 1 run gets forward and steers it just in front of backward point and takes the single easily
Harbhajan to Ponting, 1 run ouch! Gambhir intercepts a full blooded pull at forward short leg and he gets hit on the neck, he's going off the field, 'neck guards' anyone?
Yuvraj to Ponting, no run flighted on middle and off, he drives to mid-off
Yuvraj to Ponting, no run gets forward and clips him to mid-on
Yuvraj to Ponting, 1 run gets well forward and drives him down to long-off
Yuvraj to Hussey, 1 run pinches a quick single to the off side, he's doing this easily
Yuvraj to Ponting, no run gets forward and drives him down to mid-off
Yuvraj to Ponting, 1 run full outside off and driven down to cover
Harbhajan to Ponting, 1 run gets forward and works him down to deep midwicket
Harbhajan to Hussey, 1 run gets forward and pushes it just wide of midwicket
Harbhajan to Ponting, no run gets well across his stumps to defend, the ball rolls down the pitch
Harbhajan to Ponting, 1 run gets across his stumps early and clips him down to fine leg
Harbhajan to Hussey, no run gets forward and defends to the off side
Harbhajan to Hussey, no run gets forward, drops his wrists and defends with soft hands
Yuvraj to Ponting, no run gets well forward and angles it down to point
Yuvraj to Ponting, 1 run gets across and taps him down to point
Yuvraj to Hussey, no run gets forward and defends to the on side
Yuvraj to Hussey, 1 run stays back and punches it with the turn to long-on
Yuvraj to Ponting, 1 run drops it to short midwicket and sets off
Yuvraj to Hussey, no run punches it to the off side but can't pierce cover
Harbhajan to Ponting, no run flighted outside off and pushed away down to long-on
Harbhajan to Ponting, no run gets forward and tucks him to the on side
Harbhajan to Ponting, no run tries to pinch it past square leg but finds the fielder
Harbhajan to Ponting, no run full outside off and driven to point
Harbhajan to Ponting, no run gets well forward and defends with a dead bat
Harbhajan to Ponting, 1 run floated on the pads and clipped down to fine leg
Yuvraj to Ponting, no run flighted on middle and off, defended on the front foot
Yuvraj to Ponting, no run gets a huge stride forward and defends
Yuvraj to Ponting, no run stays back and punches it straight to short cover
Yuvraj to Ponting, no run full outside off and defended
Yuvraj to Ponting, 1 run gets his front foot across his stumps and clips him wide of midwicket
Yuvraj to Hussey, no run clips him on the up straight to short midwicket
Harbhajan to Ponting, 1 run flighted on middle and leg and clipped down to fine leg
Harbhajan to Hussey, no run full outside off and driven down to long-off
Harbhajan to Hussey, 2 runs drives wide of cover and Hussey hurries the fielder and takes the second run, good cricket by the Australians
Harbhajan to Hussey, 1 run knocks it in in front of point and sets off quickly, very good running
Harbhajan to Ponting, 2 runs comes down the track and chips it over midwicket
Harbhajan to Ponting, 1 run gets forward and turns it to mid-on
Yuvraj to Ponting, 1 run full outside off and he drives down to long-off
Yuvraj to Hussey, no run flighted on middle and leg and knocked to midwicket
Yuvraj to Hussey, 1 run gets forward, turns the face of the bat and clips him to fine leg
Yuvraj to Ponting, 1 run
Yuvraj to Hussey, 1 run stays back and knocks him down to deep cover
Yuvraj to Ponting, no run rocks on the backfoot and punches it on the up towards short cover
Harbhajan to Hussey, 1 run stays back and clips him down to midwicket
Harbhajan to Ponting, 1 run goes on the backfoot and cuts him down to deep point and that's his fifty
Harbhajan to Hussey, 2 runs gets forward and knocks him down to square leg
Harbhajan to Hussey, 1 run stays back and works it to long-on, he walks the single
Harbhajan to Ponting, no run defended back to the bowler
Harbhajan to Ponting, no run gets well forward and smothers the spin
Yuvraj to Hussey, no run
Yuvraj to Hussey, no run tries to work it past the bowler but Yuvraj intercepts it with his left hand
Yuvraj to Hussey, 1 run gets in position early for the paddle sweep, picks it from middle and places it to fine leg
Yuvraj to Ponting, no run
Yuvraj to Ponting, no run chance? Ponting tries to paddle it but he
Yuvraj to Ponting, 1 run goes back and scoops it over extra cover
Harbhajan to Ponting, no run gets his pad across and clips him down to square leg
Harbhajan to Ponting, 1 run comes down the pitch to a short ball and changes his shot, pulls off the front foot but can't bisect the gap at square leg
Harbhajan to Hussey, no run clips it behind square but can't beat short fine leg
Harbhajan to Hussey, 1 run overthrows! The batsmen decided against the run but an enthusiastic Raina at mid-off takes aim at the bowler's end but no backers for the throw
Harbhajan to Ponting, 1 leg bye
Harbhajan to Hussey, 1 run gets across and clips him behind square on the on side
Yuvraj to Hussey, 2 runs stays back and thumps him down to sweeper cover
Yuvraj to Hussey, 1 run plays the reverse sweep and Harbhajan does well at short fine leg to cut it off
Yuvraj to Ponting, 1 run the ball keeps low but he goes ahead with the shot and lofts him over mid-off
Yuvraj to Hussey, 1 run full outside off, driven down to long off
Yuvraj to Ponting, no run gets forward and smothers the spin
Yuvraj to Ponting, 1 run stays back, waits for the ball to come into him before thumping it to long-off
Jadeja to Ponting, 1 run full on middle and leg and driven down to long-on
Jadeja to Hussey, 1 run stays back, waits for it to turn and pulls him down to deep square-leg
Jadeja to Ponting, 1 run
Jadeja to Hussey, no run tries to fetch it from wide outside off but he misses it completely
Jadeja to Hussey, 1 run pushes it just wide of the bowler and fetches a single
Jadeja to Ponting, no run stays back and punches it back to the bowler
Praveen to Hussey, 1 run gives him width and he reaches out and cuts to third man
Praveen to Ponting, 1 run gets behind the line and the swing and punches it off the meat of the bat to long-on
Praveen to Hussey, 1 run he just opens the face of the bat and angles him down to third man
Praveen to Ponting, 1 run stays back and punches him down to long-on
Praveen to Hussey, 1 run opens the face of the bat and angles it down to third man
Praveen to Ponting, 1 run covers the swing and pushes him down to long-on

Jadeja to Ponting, OUT trapped in front! Jadeja fires it full and quick on middle, Ponting tries to clip it across the line but the ball hits the base of the pads (close to the boot) right in front of the stumps
Jadeja to White, no run Pushed back to the bowler
Jadeja to White, no run Pushed back to the bowler
Jadeja to White, no run Pushes it down the track again
Jadeja to White, no run
Jadeja to White, no run stays back and pushes it back to the bowler
Raina to Hussey, no run grips and turns sharply and Hussey manages to check his shot and not spoon it back to the bowler
Raina to Hussey, 1 run full outside off and driven down to long-off
Raina to White, no run bowls it flatter and quicker, he works it back to the bowler

Raina to White, OUT it appears as if White's got a rough decision there. Raina bowls it flat again and White leaves a small gap between bat and pad, it almost sneaks right through before reaching Dhoni who juggles and appeals for the catch, umpire Saheba g
Raina to Voges, no run pushed back to the bowler
Raina to Voges, 1 run steers it towards point
Jadeja to Voges, no run gets forward and steers the ball towards gully
Jadeja to Voges, no run played with soft hands back towards the bowler
Jadeja to Voges, no run keeps it full outside off, dug out towards short cover
Jadeja to Voges, 1 run another overpitched delivery, driven just wide of the bowler towards long-off
Jadeja to Hussey, 1 run that kept very low, Hussey manages to get the toe end of the bat on it and drive it towards mid-on
Jadeja to Voges, no run 'No' is the call after Voges pushes the ball towards cover
Raina to Hussey, 1 run full delivery just outside off, nudged towards backward point off the back foot
Raina to Voges, no run turns into the pads, clipped towards square leg
Raina to Voges, no run straighter one this time, defended to the leg side
Raina to Voges, 1 run a bit of width outside off, chopped towards point
Raina to Hussey, 1 run Hussey stays on the backfoot and plays the ball late, it was angling into his pads, whipped towards wide mid-on
Raina to Voges, no run watchfully defends a length ball pitching just outside off to end the over
Jadeja to Hussey, 2 runs 'Two, two, two' Hussey shouts after he whips the ball off the backfoot towards long-on, well-timed shot that, Harbhajan had to dive at the boundary to cut it off
Jadeja to Hussey, 2 runs dinks it past the keeper towards third man, very fine so Tendulkar had to make plenty of ground to field that one
Jadeja to Hussey, no run gets behind the line of the ball and blocks it back towards the bowler
Jadeja to Hussey, 1 run full ball on the pads, tucked behind square leg for yet another single
Jadeja to Voges, FOUR runs and a long boundary-less streak comes to an end as Voges checks his paddle-sweep to get the ball very fine down the leg side
Jadeja to Voges, no run full and outside off, blocked towards point
Raina to Hussey, no run on the pads, was going down leg so there's only a stifled appeal for lbw
Raina to Hussey, FOUR runs rocks onto the backfoot and carves the ball past cover, Sehwag misfields to give away four
Raina to Hussey, 1 run eased to long-on for an easy single
Raina to Voges, no run defended towards midwicket
Raina to Voges, 1 run the 150 comes up with a single to long-on, Voges danced down th track to drill that one down the ground
Raina to Hussey, 1 run Hussey gets on the backfoot and turns the ball towards midwicket as he has so many times this innings to get a single
Yuvraj to Hussey, 1 run and again, Hussey gets on the back foot and nudges the ball towards midwicket for a single
Yuvraj to Voges, 2 runs Voges get two by hacking the ball wide of Praveen Kumar at deep midwicket
Yuvraj to Voges, no run gets the outside edge, the ball drops short of first slip though
Yuvraj to Voges, 1 run punched towards mid-on for a single
Yuvraj to Hussey, FOUR runs superb shot from Hussey, sees the gap at point, and brings out the reverse-sweep to exploit that, kept the ball all along the ground that time
Yuvraj to Hussey, no run stands tall and jabs the ball towards mid-on
Sharma to Voges, no run flicked off the backfoot towards square leg
Sharma to Voges, 1 run length ball on middle and leg, eased down to long-on for a single
Sharma to Hussey, no run length ball on middle and off, pushed back towards the bowler, who mimes throwing down the stumps after collecting the ball
Sharma to Hussey, 1 run Hussey advances down the pitch, clips the ball behind square leg for a single
Sharma to Voges, 1 run full, on middle and off, defended towards mid-on this time
Sharma to Hussey, no run slower ball, 114kmh, Hussey had to adjust his attempted flick, gets a thick inside edge onto his thigh
Harbhajan to Voges, no run Harbhajan's first ball is pushed back to the bowler
Harbhajan to Voges, 1 wide fires it down the leg side, way beyond leg
Harbhajan to Voges, 1 run the ball continues to keep low, Voges happy to play off the backfoot, turns the ball towards square leg
Harbhajan to Hussey, no run Hussey also rocks back and drives the ball towards cover
Harbhajan to Hussey, no run
Harbhajan to Hussey, 1 run a bit of width this time, Hussey slashes it past point
Harbhajan to Voges, 1 run sharp turn for Harbhajan, Voges gets on the front foot and clips the ball towards short fine leg
Sharma to Voges, 1 run good running that, Voges gets a big stride in and dabs the ball towards point, immediately sets off for the single
Sharma to Hussey, 1 run Hussey gets to his half-century by making room and guiding the ball past the keeper towards third man, sensible batting so far from Hussey
Sharma to Voges, no run beaten outside off, Voges jumps out of the crease and looks to dab that to third man
Sharma to Voges, 1 run back of a length ball, just outside off, punched towards cover, Voges walked into that shot
Sharma to Hussey, 1 run Hussey uses his feet, Ishant drops it short, Hussey is cramped for room, whips the ball towards wide mid-on
Sharma to Voges, no run slower offcutter from Ishant to end the over, 113.5kmh, nudged towards midwicket
Harbhajan to Hussey, no run Hussey backs away and plays the ball inside out towards extra cover
Harbhajan to Hussey, 1 run sweeps a full ball from outside off towards deep backward square leg
Harbhajan to Voges, 1 wide another ball way down the leg side from Harbhajan
Harbhajan to Voges, no run a loud call of 'No' from Voges after a solid forward defensive
Harbhajan to Voges, no run looks the give the charge, it was a shortish ball, blocks it after coming down the pitch
Harbhajan to Voges, OUT Harbhajan Singh gets a wicket, Voges sashays down the track and slams the ball with the spin towards deep midwicket, Praveen hangs on to a good catch
Harbhajan to Hussey, 1 run an unflustered Hussey continues to pick off the singles, this time by tapping a full ball towards long-on
Nehra to Hussey, 1 run another single to Hussey, this time he steers the ball to short third man
Nehra to Henriques, 1 run gets off the mark by tipping the ball to the off side and immediately responding to Hussey's call for a single
Nehra to Hussey, 1 run Hussey is again content to dab an outside-off ball towards third man for a single
Nehra to Henriques, 1 run Henriques takes a leaf out of the Hussey book, he also guides the ball to third man for an easy single
Nehra to Hussey, 1 run a yorker just outside off, swinging in, Hussey squeezes it behind point
Nehra to Henriques, 1 run stands tall and punches a short of length ball from offstump towards mid-off, 'No' is the batsman's call but a misfield allows them the single
Harbhajan to Henriques, 1 run Henriques lunges forward to defend, the turn causes an inside edge which sends the ball towards square leg

Harbhajan to Hussey, 2 runs on the pads, Hussey plays it with soft hands towards square leg, superb running from Hussey, sprinting the first to put pressure on the fielder, Harbhajan screams at the fielder
Harbhajan to Hussey, 1 run pitched outside off, and turned sharply away, Hussey crashes that towaqrds backward point, Sehwag dives to his left to field that one
Harbhajan to Henriques, no run Henriques wanted the single after dropping the ball at his feet, Dhoni was quickly onto the ball
Harbhajan to Henriques, no run another dot ball, a middle stump delivery is defended to the leg side
Harbhajan to Henriques, 4 byes Henriques didn't know much about that one, it spun away sharply beating his attempted defense, runs away down the leg side, beats the keeper as well
Jadeja to Henriques, no run Henriques backs away a long way, had plenty of room as he looked to smash that over extra cover, gets a bottom-edge back towards the bowler
Jadeja to Henriques, 2 runs skips away again, carves this one to sweeper cover, good throw from Praveen, right on top of the stumps but Henriques was quick enough to make his ground in time

Jadeja to Henriques, OUT fires this one towards legstump, Henriques moves away from leg yet again, gets a bottom edge as he looks to slam that through the off, the ball bounces once before hitting legstump
Jadeja to Johnson, no run fullish ball, jammed back towards the bowler
Jadeja to Johnson, no run looks to cut a ball that is just outside off, but he doesn't make contact
Jadeja to Johnson, no run and again he doesn't get bat on ball, it goes through to Dhoni outside off, a great over from Jadeja that
Nehra to Hussey, FOUR runs Hussey's favourite slog-pull gets Australia a much-needed boundary, picks it off a length and slams it wide off deep midwicket
Nehra to Hussey, 2 runs same shot from Hussey, no as much power behind it this time, Kohli scurries across from deep midwicket to field
Nehra to Hussey, 1 run on middle and leg, nudges it towards square leg for a single
Nehra to Johnson, no run just short of length, on off, punched back to the bowler
Nehra to Johnson, no run looks to swing the ball to the leg side, it was a touch slower from Nehra, Johnson was through with his shot too early, no contact
Nehra to Johnson, no run fuller ball outside off, Johnson again looks to club it towards midwicket, misses
Jadeja to Hussey, 1 run tosses the ball up, dropped towards backward point for a single
Jadeja to Henriques, 1 run slightly overpitched on middle stump, worked towards square leg for another single
Jadeja to Hussey, 1 run full and outside off, slogged towards deep midwicket for yet another single
Jadeja to Henriques, 1 run length ball heading for off, the batsman backs away and carves it towards cover
Jadeja to Hussey, 1 run fifth consecutive single in the over, paddle-swept this time
Jadeja to Henriques, 1 run completes an over of single by slashing the ball towards cover
Nehra to Henriques, 2 runs 'Two, two, two' Hussey cries after Henriques punches the ball wide of long-on, Hussey was so quick that the throw had to go all the way to the keeper's end
Nehra to Henriques, 1 run Henriques has to put the skates on again, a full ball on the pads and he pushes it towards mid-on, the throw misses though
Nehra to Hussey, 1 run length ball on middle and off, Hussey shuffles across and whips it to deep midwicket
Nehra to Henriques, no run good over so far from Nehra, pitches this one short of a length, blocked back to the bowler, Hussey was backing up a long way, had to dive back into his crease
Nehra to Henriques, 1 leg bye another shortish ball, follows the batsman as Henriques skips away from legstump, no room for the batsman who somehow gets the ball away towards square leg
Nehra to Hussey, no run Hussey goes for a cute paddle-sweep to a full ball outside off, it sneaks under his bat, Dhoni has a tough take as the ball bounces just before it reaches him
Raina to Hussey, 1 run length ball on middle and leg, clipped towards midwicket to bring Johnson on strike
Raina to Johnson, SIX runs this time Johnson connects, and when he does connect well it's usually a six, it sails over long-on after coming down the track and slamming it against the spin
Raina to Johnson, 1 run looks for an encore, mishit towards mid-on
Raina to Hussey, 1 run very short from Raina, Hussey was way down the track, punches the ball towards long-on
Raina to Johnson, 1 run a powerful reverse-sweep from Johnson, Yuvraj dives full length to his right at point to cut it off
Raina to Hussey, 1 run looked to clobber it to long-on again, gets an outside edge which sends the ball trickling towards short third man
Nehra to Hussey, SIX runs a massive six, short ball, danced down the track, pulled wide of long-on
Nehra to Hussey, 1 wide way down the leg side, he'll have to re-bowl that one
Nehra to Hussey, 1 run much fuller this time, Hussey looks for the big swing, gets an inside-edge onto his pads, he's not sure where it's gone, it's at his feet, they take a single anyway
Nehra to Johnson, no run swing and a miss from Johnson, slightly short from Nehra, the midwicket boundary was in Johnson's radar
Nehra to Johnson, 1 run skips away from leg and bludgeons the ball along the ground to long-on for a single
Nehra to Hussey, 1 run full and well outside off, Hussey digs it out towards cover
Nehra to Johnson, 1 leg bye goes for the paddle-sweep, is hit on the pads outside off, the ball dribbles towards leg gully
Praveen Kumar got plenty of swing at the start of the innings, the part-time spinners exploited the conditions well and Jadeja had another good outing with the ball.

This is a decent score by Australia, 230 could prove a tricky target on this pitch. Michael Hussey was the star for the visitors, playing a knock straight out of the Michael Bevan handbook - nudging the ball around, running hard and only a few boundaries. Ponting
Johnson to Sehwag, 1 run hits a good length on leg and he shuffles and clips him down to fine leg
Johnson to Tendulkar, 1 wide poor delivery down the leg side and Sachin shoulders arms
Johnson to Tendulkar, 2 runs gets a bit of late swing and he turns the face of the bat to clip it wide of midwicket

Johnson to Tendulkar, FOUR runs uppish but safe, he drops it short of a length in the off stump and gets it to angle away, Tendulkar reaches out, plays away from the body and punches it in the gap between backward point and cover
Johnson to Tendulkar, no run angles it across the right hander and he lets it go
Johnson to Tendulkar, no run gets a nice stride forward and defends

Johnson to Tendulkar, FOUR runs terrific shot, 149 kph, he angles it towards the body and Tendulkar shuffles and uses the pace of the ball to clip it effortlessly past square leg, fine leg chases in vain
Siddle to Sehwag, 1 run angles it into the right hander and he tucks it just wide of mid-on
Siddle to Tendulkar, no run keeps a wee but low but Tendulkar easily gets behind it and defends with soft hands
Siddle to Tendulkar, no run 147.7 kph, pacy delivery and angles it just on that corridor outside off, well left by Tendulkar, good cricket
Siddle to Tendulkar, no run keeps it on a good length on middle and leg and he pushes it down to mid-on
Siddle to Tendulkar, no run fullish in length and he gets a generous stride forward to defend it
Siddle to Tendulkar, 1 run gets it to kick up off a good length and he taps it wide of short cover for a single
Johnson to Tendulkar, no run loses his line and dishes it wide outside off, close to being called a wide, the ball bounces twice before reaching the keeper
Johnson to Tendulkar, 1 run reaches out and this time he gets a thick outside edge to third man
Johnson to Sehwag, no run too close to cut and he nearly edges it to the keeper, extra bounce there for Johnson
Johnson to Sehwag, 1 run drops it just in front of mid-on and sets off, well run
Johnson to Tendulkar, 2 runs hops at the crease to a short delivery and times the clip very well past square leg,
Johnson to Tendulkar, 1 run he drifts on the body again and it's too easy for Tendulkar as he works it down to fine leg, not the best line to bowl I'm afraid
Siddle to Tendulkar, no run Times the punch really well but finds short cover
Siddle to Tendulkar, 1 run Angles it outside off and he opens the face of the bat and angles it to third man
Siddle to Sehwag, no run 150 kph, Siddle matches Johnson for pace, Sehwag gets beside the line and steers it to point
Siddle to Sehwag, no run tempts him with width and he can't resist a swish, lucky not to get an edge
Siddle to Sehwag, 1 run meets the ball from outside off and clips it across the line to midwicket
Siddle to Tendulkar, 2 runs drifts close to the pads and Tendulkar nearly clips it past short fine leg, the fielder misfields but deep square does well to run across and slide to cut it off
Johnson to Sehwag, no run stays behind the line and defends to the off side
Johnson to Sehwag, no run cramps him for room outside off and he tries to slice it through the off side but can't beat cover
Johnson to Sehwag, no run 147.9 kph, seemed faster than that, excellent bouncer, forces Sehwag to sway out of the way just in time
Johnson to Sehwag, 1 run fuller in length outside off, he can't resist a whack and the outside edge travels fast to third man
Johnson to Tendulkar, no run gets behind the line and defends to the off side
Johnson to Tendulkar, no run gets beside the line this time and steers it to point
Siddle to Sehwag, no run stays behind the line and defends back to the bowler
Siddle to Sehwag, no run defended on the backfoot again
Siddle to Sehwag, no run fullish outside off and in the length to drive, he pushes it down to point
Siddle to Sehwag, 1 run gets beside the line and steers it down to third man
Siddle to Tendulkar, no run he gets a thick outside edge which drops short of White at first slip, he should be standing a lot closer
Siddle to Tendulkar, no run lands it outside off and he safely shoulders arms
Johnson to Sehwag, no run he gets behind the line to a full delivery and drives to cover
Johnson to Sehwag, no run Sehwag eyes a blazing drive past backward point and nearly succeeds in beating that fielder, good stop in the end
Johnson to Sehwag, 1 leg bye he loses his direction and drifts towards the body, he clips it away easily to get off strike
Johnson to Tendulkar, no run gets beside the line and taps it to the off side
Johnson to Tendulkar, no run fuller and wider and he mistimes it to point
Johnson to Tendulkar, no run lovely straight drive off a half volley but mid-off was right at the edge of the circle to cut it off
Siddle to Sehwag, 1 run angles it towards the leg side and he shuffles and works it down to fine leg
Siddle to Tendulkar, no run lands just outside the off stump and gets it to come back in, solid in defense again
Siddle to Tendulkar, 3 runs fullish in length outside off and he times it crisply past cover, good effort by the fielder to pull it back
Siddle to Sehwag, no run keeps just a bit low but he manages to push it away easily to the off side

Siddle to Sehwag, 1 leg bye Appeal Fires it on the blockhole down the leg side and that hits Sehwag on the boot down the leg side, confident appeal and Saheba shakes his head, Sehwag's in pain and the physio walks out
Siddle to Tendulkar, 1 run angles it on middle and leg and easily clipped away down to square leg
Johnson to Tendulkar, 1 run clips a full delivery just wide of square leg, there's a misfield
Johnson to Sehwag, FOUR runs Sehwag breaks the shackles, just the sort of delivery he was waiting for, short and wide outside off and slapped over backward point, forget about chasing that
Johnson to Sehwag, no run
Johnson to Sehwag, no run tries to repeat that boundary but Johnson varies his pace and Sehwag swishes at thin air

Johnson to Sehwag, OUT timber! The middle stump is flattened, Johnson lands it in a good length on middle and off, Sehwag is trapped at the crease, he tries to work it across the line but leaves a big gap between bat and pad, the ball sneaks right through a
Johnson to Gambhir, no run good start, gets right behind the line and defends back to the bowler
Siddle to Tendulkar, no run gets forward and drives to point
Siddle to Tendulkar, no run gets behind the line and defends
Siddle to Tendulkar, no run holds the length back slightly and he gets beside the line and steers it down to point
Siddle to Tendulkar, no run fullish in length outside off and he gets forward and pushes it down to point
Siddle to Tendulkar, no run hits the deck hard and Tendulkar does well to get his bat nicely behind the line to defend
Siddle to Tendulkar, 2 runs nice backfoot punch, the fielder at cover dives to his right and parries the ball away, Hauritz runs across to field it
Bollinger to Gambhir, 1 run opens the face of the bat and steers it down to Siddle at third man
Bollinger to Tendulkar, 1 run angles it away from the right hander, he gets forward and pushes it wide of cover
Bollinger to Gambhir, no run suspect short there, he stays rooted to the crease and chases a delivery moving away from him, beaten all ends up
Bollinger to Gambhir, 1 run excellent running by Tendulkar, the minute Gambhir dropped it with soft hands to the off side his partner was off the blocks very quickly
Bollinger to Tendulkar, 1 leg bye
Bollinger to Gambhir, no run pitches it full and gets a bit of late swing, he gets forward and taps it down to mid-off
Henriques to Tendulkar, no run drops it on a good length on the off stump, Tendulkar hops and defends
Henriques to Tendulkar, 1 run opens the face of the bat and angles it down to Siddle at third man
Henriques to Gambhir, 1 run Gambhir stays at the crease, drops his wrists and knocks it towards gully with soft hands and sets off
Henriques to Tendulkar, no run shapes to drive straight but mistimes the shot back to the bowler
Henriques to Tendulkar, no run gets forward and drives firmly towards point who dives and parries the ball away
Henriques to Tendulkar, 1 run
Bollinger to Tendulkar, no run Lands outside leg and traps him high on the pads, Bollinger appeals
Bollinger to Tendulkar, 1 run
Bollinger to Gambhir, no run beaten all ends up, the ball lands outside off and fizzes past the outside edge, pacy delivery there
Bollinger to Gambhir, no run stays beside the line and taps it towards cover
Bollinger to Gambhir, 1 run angles it towards the pads and he closes the face of the bat and works it to square leg
Bollinger to Tendulkar, 1 run gets beside the line and cuts firmly down to backward point
Henriques to Tendulkar, no run
Henriques to Tendulkar, 2 runs just a touch too full and he places it just wide of short cover, nice timing

Henriques to Tendulkar, OUT he's run out by a couple of yards, Johnson hits the target, he pushes a full delivery down to mid-off and risks the single, the ball is to Johnson's left and that allows him to gather and release it quickly, the run-out was fair
Henriques to Gambhir, 1 run opens the face of the bat and angles it down to third man
Henriques to Yuvraj, no run keeps a but low and he taps it to the off side
Henriques to Yuvraj, no run gets well forward and pushes it to the off side
Bollinger to Gambhir, no run outside off and he pokes at it
Bollinger to Gambhir, no run stays beside the line and knocks it down to cover point
Bollinger to Gambhir, 1 run drops it short of a length outside off, he opens the face of the bat and angles it down to third man
Bollinger to Yuvraj, no run testing inswinging yorker, Yuvraj gets a thick inside edge onto his pads and nearly loses his balance, well bowled and Bollinger appeals for a lbw
Bollinger to Yuvraj, no run catches him fishing outside the off stump with a beautiful in-dipper
Bollinger to Yuvraj, no run swings it in again and he pushes it through the line to mid-on
Hauritz to Gambhir, no run Not much turn, lands on middle and off and he defends

Hauritz to Gambhir, OUT What a ball! Gambhir was just flummoxed, Hauritz lands it on a good length on middle, the ball grips, turns and beats the gap between pad and bat and clips the off stump, Gambhir looked quite lost at the crease and barely attempted
Hauritz to Dhoni, no run gets well forward and defends
Hauritz to Dhoni, 5 wide bonus for India, the ball keeps low, lands outside leg and beats everybody, five wides
Hauritz to Dhoni, 1 run pushes it to point off the backfoot
Hauritz to Yuvraj, 1 run stays back and punches him down to cover for a single
Hauritz to Dhoni, 1 run fetches it from the outside off and just clips it down to midwicket, there's a bit of hesitation in the running
Bollinger to Dhoni, 1 wide loses his line and drifts wide down the leg side, he tries to tickle it away
Bollinger to Dhoni, no run comes round the wicket, angles it just wide outside off and Dhoni fishes at it in attempting to drive
Bollinger to Dhoni, no run this time Dhoni decides to shoulder arms, similar delivery
Bollinger to Dhoni, 2 runs angles it towards the pads and he clips him wide of midwicket for a couple
Bollinger to Dhoni, no run fuller in length and he drives off the front foot but finds extra cover
Bollinger to Dhoni, no run stays beside the line and taps it to the off side
Bollinger to Dhoni, no run good length on off, driven on the up to extra cover
Hauritz to Yuvraj, 1 run gets beside the line and cuts to short third man
Hauritz to Dhoni, no run stays back, waits for the turn and pulls to midwicket
Hauritz to Dhoni, 1 run short again and he rocks back and pulls behind square on the on side
Hauritz to Yuvraj, no run clips it down to midwicket and there's hesitation in the running, Dhoni is sent back
Hauritz to Yuvraj, 1 run clips it towards midwicket for a quick single
Hauritz to Dhoni, 1 run stays back, waits for the turn and pushes it wide of square leg
Bollinger to Dhoni, 1 run screeching yorker on middle and off and well dug out by Dhoni, he squeezes a single
Bollinger to Yuvraj, no run 140.5 kph, seemed quicker than that, the ball fizzes past the left-hander and Yuvraj sways out of the way
Bollinger to Yuvraj, no run angles it on middle and leg, he clips it down to the on side
Bollinger to Yuvraj, 1 run full and clipped off the pads down to fine leg
Bollinger to Dhoni, 1 run pushes a single down to cover point
Bollinger to Yuvraj, no run lands it outside off and he stays beside the line and lets it go to the keeper
Hauritz to Dhoni, no run lunges forward to defend and the ball beats Dhoni
Hauritz to Dhoni, 1 run full outside off and clipped away down to long-on
Hauritz to Yuvraj, no run gets forward to defend but the ball hits his pads perhaps outside the line of leg
Hauritz to Yuvraj, FOUR runs relief for India, tossed up towards the leg side and he gets on his knee and sweeps and finds the big gap at fine leg
Hauritz to Yuvraj, no run gets well forward again and he's hit on the pads again, half hearted appeal again
Hauritz to Yuvraj, no run pushed in quicker and flatter, he defends with a dead bat
Henriques to Dhoni, no run keeps really low and Dhoni is in a tangle but he manages to tap it back to the bowler
Henriques to Dhoni, 1 run gets forward and steers it down to cover point for a single
Henriques to Yuvraj, no run
Henriques to Yuvraj, no run low bounce again, Yuvraj tries to club a half tracker and he ends up swinging at thin air, the ball bounces twice before reaching Manou
Henriques to Yuvraj, FOUR runs he puts away a half volley with ease, lovely use of the wrists there, sends the ball scorching past midwicket and wide of the fielder in the deep
Henriques to Yuvraj, no run gets forward and taps it to the off side
Hauritz to Dhoni, no run gets well forward and smothers the spin
Hauritz to Dhoni, no run stays back and defends back to the bowler
Hauritz to Dhoni, no run stays back and taps it back to the bowler, hint of turn
Hauritz to Dhoni, no run
Hauritz to Dhoni, 1 run takes a few paces down the pitch and steers it down to cover point for a single
Hauritz to Yuvraj, no run comes round the wicket to Yuvraj, lunges forward and pushes it down to cover
Henriques to Dhoni, 1 run

Henriques to Yuvraj, 2 runs another half volley on the pads, he gets forward and forcefully clips it away wide of midwicket and Johnson has a bit if work to do to slide and cut it off, the umpire checks if he made contact with the boundary
Henriques to Yuvraj, no run stays beside the line and steers it to the off side
Henriques to Yuvraj, 3 wide drifts down the leg side and the keeper Manou fumbles
Henriques to Yuvraj, 1 leg bye drifts on the pads and he clips it away off his legs down to square leg
Henriques to Dhoni, no run stays at the crease and knocks it down to mid-on
Henriques to Dhoni, (no ball) that's a poor delivery, very wide outside off and Dhoni doesn't bother to chase that, it's an overstep as well
Henriques to Dhoni, 1 run caught off the Free Hit! That's a typical 'Dhoni slap' - backs away and tries to flat-bats it over the off side, White back pedals at extra cover and takes it
Hauritz to Dhoni, no run stays back and pulls with the turn
Hauritz to Dhoni, 1 run gets forward and pushes it to the off side
Hauritz to Yuvraj, 1 run gets forward and clips it to deep square leg
Hauritz to Dhoni, 1 run knocks it down to cover point for a single
Hauritz to Yuvraj, 1 run just nudges it to the on side for a single
Hauritz to Dhoni, FOUR runs cleverly played, he gets a bit of width outside off, opens the fact of the bat and deftly angles it past the keeper and wide of short third man, he knew there was no slip
Bollinger to Yuvraj, no run comes over the wicket and Yuvraj clips it to short midwicket
Bollinger to Yuvraj, no run fullish outside off and pushed down to short cover
Bollinger to Yuvraj, 1 run swings it in at good pace, Yuvraj works his wrists well to place it wide of square leg
Bollinger to Dhoni, no run that's wide outside off, comes round the wicket and Dhoni doesn't offer a shot
Bollinger to Dhoni, no run angles it closer to the stumps, Dhoni gets a half stride forward and defends to the off side
Bollinger to Dhoni, 1 run full outside off and driven down to sweeper cover for a single
Hauritz to Dhoni, 1 run flighted outside off and tapped to the off side
Hauritz to Yuvraj, no run flighted on middle and leg and defended with soft hands
Hauritz to Yuvraj, 1 run gets forward to the pitch of the ball and drives down to wide long-off
Hauritz to Dhoni, FOUR runs poor delivery and spanked, half volley outside off and he reaches out and bisects the big gap at deep extra cover
Hauritz to Dhoni, 1 run that's a high full toss and he fails to put it away, just a single to long-off
Hauritz to Yuvraj, FOUR runs another poor delivery, low full toss from round the wicket and Yuvraj gets forward and clubs it across the line and finds the gap at deep midwicket
Bollinger to Dhoni, 1 bye starts with a ball well outside off, Dhoni
Bollinger to Yuvraj, no run again wide of off, Yuvraj swings and misses this time
Bollinger to Yuvraj, 1 run shortish ball rising into the ribs, Yuvraj gets on his toes and clips it to square leg
Bollinger to Dhoni, no run good line and length, just outside off, Dhoni punches it back to the bowler
Bollinger to Dhoni, no run shorter this time, on middle and off, Dhoni looks to whip it to midwicket but can't get hold of it, hits his thigh and rolls away
Bollinger to Dhoni, 1 run full and just outside off, Dhoni bends his knees but doesn't move his feet as he digs that out towards cover
Siddle to Dhoni, 1 run Siddle puts it on a length just outside off, Dhoni pushes it towards point
Siddle to Yuvraj, 1 wide down the leg side, Yuvraj looks to tickle it past the keeper but misses
Siddle to Yuvraj, no run pitched up, just outside off, Yuvraj leans into the off drive nicely
Siddle to Yuvraj, no run much shorter this time, on middle and leg, Yuvraj gets behind the line and jabs it to the leg side
Siddle to Yuvraj, 1 bye full and wide, Yuvraj looks to steer it past the keeper but misses, the ball takes off after passing the wicket making it difficult for the keeper to catch
Siddle to Dhoni, 1 run a bit of width, Dhoni tries to club it, bottom-edge take it towards point
Siddle to Yuvraj, 2 wide the extras continue to pile up, wide down the leg side, Manou again has a difficult take as the ball bounces for the second time just ahead of him
Siddle to Dhoni, 1 run homing into the base of offstump, squeezed out towards cover
Bollinger to Dhoni, no run back of length, on offstump, Dhoni opens the face to get it away towards point
Bollinger to Dhoni, 2 runs length ball, heading for off, Dhoni steers it just wide of third man, giving the batsmen time to sprint back for the second
Bollinger to Dhoni, 1 run on the pads this time, Dhoni looks to tuck it to square leg, is hit on the pads but the ball was missing leg, it rolls towards square leg
Bollinger to Yuvraj, 1 bye Manou's troubles continues as a very short bouncer from Bollinger lands a couple of yards ahead of him, can't collect cleanly again
Bollinger to Dhoni, no run length ball on off, Dhoni eases it towards covers
Bollinger to Dhoni, no run aiming for middle stump this time, Dhoni blocks it back to the bowler
Siddle to Yuvraj, no run 'Nooooo' screams Dhoni after Yuvraj charges down the track after pushing the ball to point, Voges swoops on the ball and throws down the stumps, Yuvraj is back though
Siddle to Yuvraj, no run Yuvraj defends cautiously to the off side
Siddle to Yuvraj, no run full ball outside off, driven firmly to mid-off, too firmly to have time for a single
Siddle to Yuvraj, 1 run on the pads, clipped towards deep midwicket for a comfortable single
Siddle to Dhoni, no run only one run from five balls, as Dhoni flicks a full ball from just outside off towards mid-on
Siddle to Dhoni, 1 run Dhoni keeps strike by easing a short ball outside off towards sweeper cover
Johnson to Dhoni, no run a bizarre shot from Dhoni, who is surprised by the bouncer, after a single-handed wristy pull the ball dribbles to the leg side
Johnson to Dhoni, no run gets on the back foot and drives it to short cover
Johnson to Dhoni, no run Dhoni leaves alone a ball that angles across him
Johnson to Dhoni, 1 bye another bye, Manou's torrid time continues, this was well outside off, Dhoni was not interested in it, again the awkward bounce troubles Manou
Johnson to Yuvraj, no run this time Manou takes it cleanly, Yuvraj shoulders arms to a delivery well outside off
Johnson to Yuvraj, no run full ball, on off, Yuvraj jams it towards mid-on, end of another tight over
Henriques to Dhoni, no run Dhoni swings at a ball outside off but misses
Henriques to Dhoni, no run Dhoni advances down the track, still can't get to the pitch of the ball, so he defends it towards the bowler
Henriques to Dhoni, 1 run this time he steals a quick single, gets forward and punches the ball to mid-off
Henriques to Yuvraj, 1 run angling into off, Yuvraj opens the face of the bat to steer the ball to point, another sharp single
Henriques to Dhoni, 1 run a bit wide outside off, Dhoni carves it towards sweeper cover for a single
Henriques to Yuvraj, 1 run on middle and leg, another easy single, this time Yuvraj glances the ball to fine leg
Johnson to Yuvraj, no run Manou's nightmare continues, he can't collect the ball again after Yuvraj is beaten outside off, doesn't give away any runs though
Johnson to Yuvraj, 1 run angling into the batsman, who tickles it down to fine leg for a single
Johnson to Dhoni, 1 run short ball, on middle, Dhoni clips it towards midwicket for a single
Johnson to Yuvraj, no run Johnson bangs it in on an unresponsive pitch, doesn't trouble Yuvraj much, he defends it back down the pitch
Johnson to Yuvraj, 1 run a quick single is taken, Yuvraj punches the ball to mid-on, Dhoni calls and Yuvraj responds immediately
Johnson to Dhoni, no run fullish delivery outside off, Dhoni jabs it towards short cover
Henriques to Yuvraj, SIX runs wow, sensational timing from Yuvraj, almost no power behind that flick which sends the ball sailing over the long-on boundary
Henriques to Yuvraj, no run a touch shorter, on middle and off, defended by Yuvraj
Henriques to Yuvraj, FOUR runs Yuvraj starting to turn it on, timing is top-class again, Yuvraj dances down the track and threads it through the covers
Henriques to Yuvraj, 1 run on legstump this time, Yuvraj helps it along to fine leg
Henriques to Dhoni, no run length ball on middle and leg, pushed towards mid-on by Dhoni
Henriques to Dhoni, no run a near yorker just outside off, Dhoni squeezes it out towards mid-off
Voges to Yuvraj, 1 run Yuvraj gets on the back foot and nudges the ball behind square leg for a single
Voges to Dhoni, 1 run on middle and off, Dhoni eases it towards point, a tight single is taken
Voges to Yuvraj, no run muscled back to the bowler, Dhoni scrambles back into his crease
Voges to Yuvraj, SIX runs short ball, Yuvraj says thank you and bludgeons it over the long-on boundary
Voges to Yuvraj, FOUR runs the crowd as going crazy as Yuvraj switches to top gear, a low full toss outside off is slapped to the point boundary, that his 50 as well
Voges to Yuvraj, 1 run Yuvraj backs away and slashes it towards point again, can't beat the fielder this time
Hauritz to Yuvraj, no run Yuvraj keeps bat and pad close together as he blocks the ball back towards the bowler
Hauritz to Yuvraj, no run watches the loop carefully before he defends towards point
Hauritz to Yuvraj, 1 run gets the front leg out of the way and looks to power that one, but doesn't get hold of it and it dribbles to the leg side
Hauritz to Dhoni, 1 run turn and bounce for Hauritz, Dhoni waits for it on the backfoot and dabs it towards point
Hauritz to Yuvraj, no run speared in by Hauritz, heading for off, Yuvraj defends off the front foot
Hauritz to Yuvraj, 1 run a bit of width and Yuvraj gets it away to sweeper cover, who had to run to his right to field, giving time to take the second
Henriques to Yuvraj, no run well outside off, Yuvraj moved across menacingly but lets the ball go
Henriques to Yuvraj, FOUR runs no leaving it this time, an overpitched ball outside off, Yuvraj was down the pitch and elegantly drives it in the air between cover and extra cover

Henriques to Yuvraj, FOUR runs Bang! that was a bullet from Yuvraj, nicely in the slot, Yuvraj whacks it straight back past the bowler, there was a small chance of a caught and bowled but it Henriques did well to not get hurt by that power drive
Henriques to Yuvraj, no run outside off, Yuvraj looks to get it to third man but misses
Henriques to Yuvraj, no run on middle and off, Yuvraj shows the full face of the bat as he blocks it back to the bowler
Henriques to Yuvraj, no run looks for the expansive cover drive to a wide ball, gets a thick edge onto it, sending the ball back towards the bowler
Hauritz to Dhoni, 1 run Dhoni is having a much quieter time, again he is content ot give Yuvraj the strike by pushing the ball towards cover
Hauritz to Yuvraj, 1 run quicker ball from Hauritz, on the pads, guided behind square leg
Hauritz to Dhoni, 1 run Dhoni jogs through for the single after flatbatting the ball wide of Hauritz to long-on
Hauritz to Yuvraj, no run fired into offstump, Yuvraj defends it to the leg side
Hauritz to Yuvraj, no run slightly shorter this time, Yuvraj is happy to tap it towards mid-on

Hauritz to Yuvraj, no run Yuvraj looks to sweep, misses and is hit on the pads, stifled appeal for lbw, did that ball pitch in line or was it outside leg? Hawk-eye suggests that was out, but even the Australians didn't go up whole-heartedly
Bollinger to Dhoni, 1 run Bollinger gets his first ball to angle into offstump, pushed towards mid-off
Bollinger to Yuvraj, no run
Bollinger to Yuvraj, 2 runs great shot from Yuvraj, somehow manages to impart a lot of power to a yorker on middle and leg, well fielded at long-on
Bollinger to Yuvraj, 1 run opens the face to steer the ball towards third man, walks through for the single
Bollinger to Dhoni, 1 run length ball just outside off, Dhoni wrists it away towards sweeper cover
Bollinger to Yuvraj, no run length ball, homing into off, defended by Yuvraj
Siddle to Dhoni, 1 run full and on the pads, helped along to fine leg
Siddle to Yuvraj, 2 runs Yuvraj plays the wide ball late, places it to the left of third man giving time to get the second
Siddle to Yuvraj, 1 run tipped towards backward point for a quick single
Siddle to Dhoni, 1 run full ball, into middle and off, Dhoni punches it to mid-on and takes a tight single
Siddle to Yuvraj, 1 run ooh, Yuvraj was looking to play that inside out, bottom hand comes off the handle but the ball flies through the gap between cover and extra cover
Siddle to Dhoni, no run Dhoni gets forward and taps a full ball towards mid-on, too firmly to have time for a single
Bollinger to Yuvraj, no run Yuvraj is cramped for room by that ball coming into him, he adjusts late and dabs the ball towards point

Bollinger to Yuvraj, no run crisply driven back to the bowler, Yuvraj was a couple of steps out of the crease after playing the shot when Bollinger fielded it smartly, Yuvraj hurries back into the crease
Bollinger to Yuvraj, no run length ball outside off, Yuvraj looks to steer to third man but misses
Bollinger to Yuvraj, 1 run Yuvraj dabs the ball from middle stump towards third man for a comfortable single
Bollinger to Dhoni, no run Dhoni misses out, a full toss outside off and he fails to connect with the ball, Manou again struggles to collect the ball
Bollinger to Dhoni, no run short of length ball, just outside off, Dhoni backs away and pushes the ball to cover point
Johnson to Yuvraj, 1 run Johnson's first delivery is dabbed towards point, he sprints for the single, Dhoni responds immediately
Johnson to Dhoni, 1 run Dhoni dances down the track, it was a short of length ball, Dhoni manages to flick the ball towards deep square leg
Johnson to Yuvraj, no run just outside off, Yuvraj defends the ball towards short cover
Johnson to Yuvraj, no run a bouncer outside off, Yuvraj sways out of the way
Johnson to Yuvraj, no run
Johnson to Yuvraj, no run well outside off, Yuvraj is content to leave that one alone
Hauritz to Dhoni, 1 run Dhoni skips away and bunts the ball towards long-on
Hauritz to Yuvraj, 1 run short and wide, Yuvraj can only get a single after swiping it towards sweeper cover
Hauritz to Dhoni, no run Dhoni gets forward and defends the ball towards cover
Hauritz to Dhoni, no run on the pads this time, Dhoni blocks off the backfoot
Hauritz to Dhoni, 2 runs gets the outside edge as Dhoni pushes at the ball, it runs away fine towards third man
Hauritz to Dhoni, no run Dhoni gets well forward and defends the ball to the off side
Henriques to Yuvraj, 1 run short ball just outside off, Yuvraj slashes it towards backward point, where Voges dives to his right and makes an athletic stop
Henriques to Dhoni, 1 wide going down the leg side, free run for India
Henriques to Dhoni, 1 run Dhoni gets a sharp single after clubbing the ball towards mid-on, Dhoni collides with Henriques as he scrambles the run
Henriques to Yuvraj, FOUR runs Yuvraj waits in his crease and punches the ball fluently through the off side, the ball speeds to the cover boundary
Henriques to Yuvraj, 1 run India reach 200, played off the pads towards square leg
Henriques to Dhoni, 1 run Dhoni stays balanced and pushes the ball past the bowler for one more

Henriques to Yuvraj, OUT lbw! Henriques came round the wicket and angled a good length ball into the left-hander, Yuvraj stayed in his crease, missed it and got hit on the back pad, was that going down leg? Umpire Saheba didn't think so. Yuvraj's played a
Hauritz to Dhoni, 1 run a touch short just outside off, Dhoni moves back and cuts towards deep point
Hauritz to Raina, no run Raina cuts the ball hard but straight to point
Hauritz to Raina, no run that's a shooter! And Raina's lucky that it was outside off stump
Hauritz to Raina, no run another one beats the bat, well he got an under-edge that didn't go on to his stumps
Hauritz to Raina, no run Raina nudges to the off side and wants the single, Dhoni sends him back
Hauritz to Raina, no run Raina steps out of his crease and blocks, Hauritz has competed a testing over
Siddle to Dhoni, 1 run Siddle starts with a full ball on offstump, Dhoni punches it to mid-off
Siddle to Raina, 1 run nicely done by Raina, backs away and dabs the ball to third man
Siddle to Dhoni, no run Dhoni goes for the roundhouse cut to a ball outside off, misses the ball
Siddle to Dhoni, FOUR runs Shot! overpitched ball outside off, Dhoni clouts it past the bowler for four, no one's stopping that rocket
Siddle to Dhoni, no run full and outside off, Dhoni looks to cross-bat it towards long-on, bottom edges it towards the bowler
Siddle to Dhoni, no run well outside off, Dhoni lets it go, Manou has a big smile on his face after collecting that ball
Johnson to Raina, 1 run on legstump, Raina shuffles across and turns it in front of square leg
Johnson to Dhoni, FOUR runs short ball from Johnson, cracked past a diving Voges at backward point, Dhoni has ridiculously quick hands
Johnson to Dhoni, FOUR runs Dhoni is calming Indian nerves here, length ball outside off, crunched past mid-off for four
Johnson to Dhoni, no run length ball on off, defended towards cover, Raina wanted the single but Dhoni sends him back
Johnson to Dhoni, 1 run on legstump, whipped behind square leg for a single
Johnson to Raina, 1 run another single, this time Raina uses his wrists to get the ball away towards deep midwicket
Siddle to Raina, no run Raina goes for the big swipe, doesn't get hold of it, it dribbles towards mid-on
Siddle to Raina, 1 run fullish ball on middle and leg, turned towards midwicket for a single
Siddle to Dhoni, no run Dhoni goes for a flamboyant cut to a wide ball, gets the bottom edge towards the bowler
Siddle to Dhoni, 1 run a flat-batted wallop to mid-off, Dhoni scampers through for a tight single
Siddle to Raina, 1 run Raina backs away to make room, and steers the ball from middle stump towards backward point
Siddle to Dhoni, FOUR runs a fantastic shot from Dhoni, just to show he's not all about brute force, pure timing and placement there, skips away and guides the ball behind backward point
Johnson to Raina, no run that one kept a bit low, Raina manages to defend back to the bowler
Johnson to Raina, FOUR runs a misfield ends the game, Raina moves across and tickles the ball to fine leg, where the fielder gets across in time but can't collect the ball
That's it from us at Cricinfo today. Thanks for the mails and the company. Do joins us again on Monday for the Mohali game.

"On this wicket, I think everybody bowled well. I'm really happy. If there was no dew 220-230 could have been difficult to chase. The pitch was looking really ugly. All in all, it was a great team effort."

"The ball change was the best time to score (when Aus were batting) but we lost a bit of momentum there. India outplayed us today. It was definitely a better batting surface earlier in the day. We have lost two games in a row, hopefully we'll get a few more runs
Post-match presentation:

Yuvraj and Dhoni made the difference today. A 148-run stand in a low-scoring game was too much for Australia to overcome. They fought till the end though, but just couldn't get the breakthrough they needed. India were certainly nervous after Gambhir was dismissed
India won by 6 wickets (with 10 balls remaining)
Player of the match is Yuvraj Singh, INDIA
